law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1984; and ch. 397, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 13, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 7, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Specific duties of department relating to testing.
